vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the Edomites living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.36.4;
son of: Esau (H6215) and Mahalath (H4258);
half-brother of: Eliphaz (H0464), Jeush (H3266), Jalam (H3281) and Korah (H7141);
father of: Nahath (H5184), Zerah (H2226), Shammah (H8048) and Mizzah (H4199)
§ Reuel or Raguel = "friend of God"
1) a son of Esau by his wife Bashemath, the sister of Ishmael
2) the father-in-law of Moses
2a) also 'Jethro'
3) father of Eliasaph, the leader of the tribe of Gad at the time of the census at Sinai
4) a Benjamite, ancestor of Elah
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Esaú; (b)   suegro de Moisés; madianita; (c)   padre de Eliasaf; tribu de Gad; ver también [d.uveel]; (d)   hijo de Ibnías; ancestro de Mesulam; tribu de Benjamín
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
流珥 (Reuel 或 Raguel) 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "上帝的朋友"
1) 以掃與其妻(以實瑪利的姊妹)巴實抹的兒子
2) 摩西的岳父
2a) 亦作 '葉忒羅'
3) 在西乃人口普查時代迦得支派首領以利雅薩的父親(中文作"丟珥")(民 2:14)
4) 便雅憫人, 以拉的祖先(代上 9:8)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
流珥 (Reuel 或 Raguel) 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "上帝的朋友"
1) 以扫与其妻(以实玛利的姊妹)巴实抹的儿子
2) 摩西的岳父
2a) 亦作 '叶忒罗'
3) 在西乃人口普查时代迦得支派首领以利雅萨的父亲(中文作"丢珥")(民 2:14)
4) 便雅悯人, 以拉的祖先(代上 9:8)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at 1Ch.9.8;
son of: Ibnijah (H2998);
father of: Shephatiah (H8203H)
§ Reuel or Raguel = "friend of God"
1) a son of Esau by his wife Bashemath, the sister of Ishmael
2) the father-in-law of Moses
2a) also 'Jethro'
3) father of Eliasaph, the leader of the tribe of Gad at the time of the census at Sinai
4) a Benjamite, ancestor of Elah

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Num.1.14;
father of: Eliasaph (H0460); also called Reuel at Num.2.14;
Another name of de.u.el (דְּעוּאֵל "Deuel" H1845)
§ Reuel or Raguel = "friend of God"
1) a son of Esau by his wife Bashemath, the sister of Ishmael
2) the father-in-law of Moses
2a) also 'Jethro'
3) father of Eliasaph, the leader of the tribe of Gad at the time of the census at Sinai
4) a Benjamite, ancestor of Elah

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Exo.2.18;
father of: Zipporah (H6855) and Hobab (H2246); also called Reuel (KJV: Raguel) at Num.10.29;
Another name of yit.ro (יִתְרוֹ "Jethro" H3503)
§ Reuel or Raguel = "friend of God"
1) a son of Esau by his wife Bashemath, the sister of Ishmael
2) the father-in-law of Moses
2a) also 'Jethro'
3) father of Eliasaph, the leader of the tribe of Gad at the time of the census at Sinai
4) a Benjamite, ancestor of Elah
